as a: Data steward of a patient registry
I would like to: be guided towards good FAIR implementation choices for my data
such that I can: make my data efficiently useable in combination with other FAIR resources in automated scenarios
sum: As a Data steward of a patient registry I would like to be guided towards good FAIR implementation choices for my data such that I can make my data efficiently useable in combination with other FAIR resources in automated scenarios.

I would like to: be guided towards good FAIR implementation choices for my data
such that I can: make my data efficiently useable in combination with other FAIR resources in automated scenarios
sum: As a FAIR data steward I would like to be guided towards good FAIR implementation choices for my data such that I can make my data efficiently useable in combination with other FAIR resources in automated scenarios.

as a: Data steward of a patient registry
such that I can: provide information to other stakeholders who build the architecture of the system.
sum: As a Data steward of a patient registry I would like to generate a FAIRification plan such that I can provide information to other stakeholders who build the architecture of the system.

as a: Data steward of a patient registry
such that I can: provide information to PIs to make decisions on the system.
sum: As a Data steward of a patient registry I would like to generate a FAIRification plan such that I can provide information to PIs to make decisions on the system.

such that I can: learn how to use the tool efficiently.
sum: As a Explorer of the virtual platform I would like to get information such that I can learn how to use the tool efficiently.
